trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There was one other sighting in Columbus on or around July 6th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsLights appeared in the southwest direction and began to form in a triangular formation, they faded out and reappeared in a straight, multiple eyewitness with video evidence
Summary: Lights appeared and blinked on and off, similar to the Phoenix 1997 sighting, multiple eyewitness with video evidence
